attributes.action: Stop Mothers being able to cut fathers contact without a court order.
attributes.additional_details: No one else will make this change and it is not right that fathers have to sit and wait months for a court hearing etc before contact can be resumed, just because some mothers use the children as a weapon, its affecting childrens mental health and the mental health of the parent who suddenly cannot pick up his or her child anymore for a reason that the other parent has decided.
attributes.background: Make it a law that one parent cannot cut the other parent out of a childs life unless their is a legitimate saftely concern involving a child protection governing body, or a court order.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Give parents automatic rights to equal contact with children after separation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583870

Make parental alienation a criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565101
